price: (45) Say, "I only warn you by revelation." But the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أُنذِرُكُم بِٱلۡوَحۡيِۚ وَلَا يَسۡمَعُ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا مَا يُنذَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qul innamā undhirukum bil-waḥyi walā yasmaʿu al-ṣumu al-duʿāa idhā mā yundharūna
